projectDescription: Web application for managing characters in a custom-built tabletop role-playing game system. Features a dynamic multi-step character creation process, including point allocation for attributes, values, and special effects.

Social availability app that helps friends coordinate hangouts. Users can create and share availability windows, filter by custom categories, and send structured hangout requests. Deployed on Azure with automated CI/CD.
Pizza shop management system with a React frontend and a .NET backend. Managed ticketing, created order views, and built backend APIs to support order management with clear site logic.
